$eref.description: Trait that applies a globally unique id.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

____id.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.

$eref.description: The version of ANS that this object was serialized as.
$eref.title: Describes the ANS version of this object

___version.description: The version string, with in major.minor.patch format

$eref.description: Trait that helps support strongly-typed implementations of this schema.
$eref.title: Type trait

___type.description: The concrete type of element the implementing element is.

$eref.description: Trait that helps support strongly-typed implementations of this schema.
$eref.title: Subtype trait

___subtype.description: A more granular type than story, gallery, etc. (E.g., column, blog-post)

$eref.description: Trait that applies common publishing-related dates to a schema.
$eref.title: Dated trait

___created_date.description: When the content was originally created (RFC3339-formatted).

___last_updated_date.description: When the content was last updated (RFC3339-formatted).

$eref.description: Trait that captures the need to attribute ownership or authorship to content.
$eref.title: Credit trait

___credits.description: People and groups attributed to this content, keyed by type of contribution.

$eref.description: Encapsulates characteristics defining language, locale, etc.
$eref.title: Describes language for an element

___language.description: The primary language of the content. The value should follow IETF BCP47. (e.g. 'en', 'es-419', etc.)

$eref.description: Captures information related to the location of the content.
$eref.title: Location related trait

___location.description: A description of the location, useful if a full address or lat/long specification is overkill.

___geo.description: Latitidue and Longitude of the content

$eref.description: Defines the structure of copyright information, as applied to content.
$eref.title: Copyright information

___copyright.description: The copyright notice, e.g. '(c) 2015 The Washington Post, Inc.'

$eref.description: Holds the collection of tags, categories, keywords, etc that describe content.
$eref.title: Taxonomy

$eref.description: Trait that applies a owner information to a document or resource.
$eref.title: Owner information

___owner.description: Information about the owner of this content.

___id.description: The unique identifier for this owner.

$eref.description: Trait that applies planning information to a document or resource.
$eref.title: Scheduling information

___scheduled_publish_date.description: When the content was first published.

___planned_publish_date.description: When the content is planned to be published.

___inch_count_actual.description: The current length of the story in inches.

___word_count_planned.description: The anticipated number of words in the story.

___inch_count_planned.description: The anticipated length of the story in inches.

___publish_date.description: When the story was first published.

___canonical_url.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

___short_url.description: A url-shorterned version of the canonical_url.

___revision.description: In systems with versioning / history, the id of the revision should be saved here

___status.description: Optional field to store story workflow related status (e.g. published/embargoed/etc)

$eref.description: A key-value group of headlines. Key is used to describe context in which a certain value should be used as the headline.
$eref.title: A headlines key-value set.

___subheadlines.description: The subheadline(s) (or deks) for the story.

___editor_note.description: Additional information to be displayed in/near the story html content from the editor.

___label.description: What the Washington Post calls a Kicker

___source.description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content

___publish_date.description: When the story was first published.

___canonical_url.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

___short_url.description: A url-shorterned version of the canonical_url.

___revision.description: In systems with versioning / history, the id of the revision should be saved here

___status.description: Optional field to store story workflow related status (e.g. published/embargoed/etc)

___subheadlines.description: The subheadline(s) (or deks) for the story.

___editor_note.description: Additional information to be displayed in/near the story html content from the editor.

___label.description: What the Washington Post calls a Kicker

___source.description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content

___related_content.description: A set of lists of IDs referencing other content items this story is related to.

___description.description: Description(s) of the story, keyed by context.

___display_date.description: The RFC3339-formatted dated time of the most recent date the story was (re)displayed on a public site.

___syndication.description: Key-boolean pair of syndication services where this article may go

___promo_images.description: List of promotional images to use when highlighting the story.

$eref.title: A content object.

___related_content.description: A set of lists of IDs referencing other content items this story is related to.

$eref.title: A headlines key-value set.

___syndication.description: Key-boolean pair of syndication services where this article may go

$eref.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.
$eref.title: An image.

___promo_images.description: List of promotional images to use when highlighting the story.

$eref.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.
$eref.title: An image.

description: Holds common attributes of ANS Content objects.
title: A content object.
